ReferenceDocuments.name: SCORRES;SCTEST;SCTESTCD
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable. In addition to the SDTMIG variable SCORRES, create the SDTMIG variable SCTESTCD from the CDASH variable name and determine the value of SCTEST from SCTESTCD. The CDASH prompt may also contain the SCTEST. Use appropriate CDISC Controlled Terminology for the test and test code.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Each test may be collected using the CDASH variable [TESTCD] (e.g., MARISTAT) or [TESTCD]_SCORRES where TESTCD is the appropriate CT for the SC test code e.g., MARISTAT_SCORRES. This CDASH variable name is an example of what "variable name" can be used in a denormalized data structure.

DataElement.changeDescription: 2021-6-15 ak Released per governance approval. 2/19/20 tmt transferred ownership from NRDS to NCI Standards/BMaeske and restored CSIs. 11-26-19 tmt removed NCI CSI, associated with NRDS CSI and changed Registration Status. 11-25-19 tmt transferred ownership from NCI Standards to NRDS/BMaeske. Created as part of the CDISC mapping task_ghd_08.27.18
